onboarding-account-created.account-with-: A new acccount has been generated, with the following address:
onboarding-account-created.explain-image: Every account gets an automatically generated image associated with it. This canbe used to double-check that the address was entered correctly when sending RISE.
onboarding-account-created.title: Your new account
onboarding-add-account.existing-account-: I want to access an existing account on the RISE network
onboarding-add-account.new-account-tip: I want to create a new account on the RISE network
onboarding-add-account.title: RISE wallet
onboarding-choose-language.title: RISE wallet
onboarding-existing-account-type.full-ac: I know the secret mnemonic for this account
onboarding-existing-account-type.read-ac: I don't know the secret mnemonic for this account
onboarding-existing-account-type.title: Select account type
onboarding-existing-account.enter-addres: Enter the address of an existing RISE account you wish to access:
onboarding-existing-account.recover-from: Forgotten your address but have your secret mnemonic? Click here
onboarding-existing-account.title: Existing account
onboarding-new-account.title: New account
onboarding-new-account.using-ledger: Import an account from hardware wallet
onboarding-new-account.using-ledger-tip: I want to import a new account from my Ledger hardware wallet
onboarding-new-account.using-mnemonic: Create an account using a secret
onboarding-new-account.using-mnemonic-ti: I want to create a new account that can be accessed using a mnemonic secret
onboarding-new-mnemonic.mnemonic-grants-: NB! Anyone who knows this can transfer funds out of your account.
onboarding-new-mnemonic.mnemonic-pretext: This is your new {wordCount, number}-word mnemonic secret:
onboarding-new-mnemonic.title: Write this down
onboarding-new-mnemonic.write-mnemonic-d: Write your mnemonic down on a physical piece of paper so that you could store it in a safe place later.
onboarding-security-notice.apply-updates: Always keep your operating system, anti-virus software and browser up to date with latest security updates.
onboarding-security-notice.correct-url-t: When accessing this wallet, always type the URL into the browser address bar yourself or use a bookmark that you yourself created. Never trust links posted on social media, in search results, sent in emails or listed on other websites.
onboarding-security-notice.hardware-wall: If possible, prefer hardware wallets over mnemonic secret for storing larger amounts of RISE.
onboarding-security-notice.keep-in-mind: Things to keep in mind to increase the security of your funds:
onboarding-security-notice.own-devices-t: Only use your own devices when accessing your accounts. Do not enter your mnemonic secret on untrustworthy devices (public computers, friends computers/phones, etc) as they might be littered with malware and keyloggers.
onboarding-security-notice.title: Security tips
onboarding-security-notice.trust-browser: If your browser gives you any sort of security warning about this web wallet, get in touch with us and report it. Do not ignore the warning nor enter your mnemonic secret!
onboarding-verify-mnemonic.title: Check mnemonic
onboarding-verify-mnemonic.verify-mnemon: Verify that you wrote down your mnemonic correctly. Enter the {whichWordInBold} into the text field below.
{whichWord, selectordinal, one {#st word} two {#nd word} few {#rd word} other {#th word}}
